title: 开不了服
author: 柠檬。
txt_content:
Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_51\bin\serv
er\jvm.dll'.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
'oing' 不是内部或外部命令，也不是可运行的程序

或批处理文件。


一只滚动这个信息

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
java问题。重装java 

然后去C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_51\bin创造一个文件夹叫做server
然后去C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_51\bin\client folder把里面的东西都复制到刚刚的server内

replies.author: 柠檬。
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-24 18:46
java问题。重装java 

然后去C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_51\bin创造一个文件夹叫做server
求开服bat

replies.author: 柠檬。
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-24 19:12
这下子是内存不足啦~ 
Could not reserve enough space for 3145728KB object heap
那要怎么设置

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
柠檬。 发表于 2015-8-24 12:10
likely be removed in a future release
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserv ...
这下子是内存不足啦~ 
Could not reserve enough space for 3145728KB object heap

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
柠檬。 发表于 2015-8-24 12:11
那要怎么设置
把你bat发出来吧 ←_←

replies.author: 柠檬。
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-24 19:14
把你bat发出来吧 ←_←
@echo off
:begin
title 梦想之城
java -server -Xincgc -Xmx3G XX:-MaxPermSize=256M -jar spigot-1.8.7.jar
oing 127.0.0.1
goto begin

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
柠檬。 发表于 2015-8-24 12:17
@echo off
:begin
title 梦想之城
3G超出X32java的内容了，调整为1G吧 还有oing不是内部或外部命令，也不是可运行的程序 （所以说没用的东西）

replies.author: 柠檬。
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-24 19:21
3G超出X32java的内容了，调整为1G吧 还有oing不是内部或外部命令，也不是可运行的程序 （所以说没用的东 ...

错误: 找不到或无法加载主类 XX:-MaxPermSize=256M
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will
 likely be removed in a future release

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
柠檬。 发表于 2015-8-24 12:21
错误: 找不到或无法加载主类 XX:-MaxPermSize=256M
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM warning: Using increme ...
你的XX:-MaxPermSize=256M

把红色部位删了放到XX前面

replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-24 19:21

XX:-MaxPermSize=256M 这个删掉就OK了 ！！！！！
不过也感谢你！！！！
